docs.title: Documentation
docs.c2eBody: Handled automatically via the app. Wait 100 consensus block time (~10 min) for funds to appear.
docs.e2cBody: This transfer is now enabled for preliminary testing. Note that transaction progress and history are not available for this transfer type. Funds are expected to arrive on the Consensus chain after approximately 14,400 blocks (around 24 hours). Please proceed with caution. For manual transfers, you can still use this guide: {0}.
docs.setupConsensus: Consensus: Use SubWallet/Talisman with Autonomys Consensus (RPC: {0}, SS58 {1}).
docs.setupEvm: EVM: Add Auto-EVM to MetaMask (ID {0} via {1}).
docs.setupSdkLink: This app is built using the {0} and {1}.

e2cWarning.title: Preliminary Testing Notice
e2cWarning.message: The Auto-EVM to Consensus transfer mode is for preliminary testing only. Transaction progress and history are not available for this type of transfer. Please proceed with caution.

e2cInBlock.title: Transfer Submitted
e2cInBlock.message: Your transfer has been successfully submitted and included in a block. It is expected to arrive on the Consensus chain after approximately 14,400 blocks (around 24 hours). You can now safely close this window or start another transfer.

history.title: Transaction History
history.empty: No transactions yet. Your activity will appear here.
